'''Martha Mackintosh''' is an English actress best known for her role in the television series ''Stella''. She is the daughter of actors [[wikipedia:Steven Mackintosh|Steven Mackintosh]] and [[wikipedia:Lisa Jacobs|Lisa Jocobs]].

In ''[[Game of Thrones: A Telltale Games Series]]'', she voices [[Mira Forrester]].
